title: Western | Salome, Where She Danced (1945) Yvonne De Carlo, Rod Cameron, David Bruce | Subtitled

sources.title: Western | Salome, Where She Danced (1945) Yvonne De Carlo, Rod Cameron, David Bruce | Subtitled
sources.description:
She made guns grow cold...and hearts Burn Hot - as she set the West afire!
During the Austrian-Prussian war, Anna Marie is a dancer who is forced to flee her country after she is accused of being a spy. She ends up in a lawless western town in Arizona, where she proceeds to vamp numerous men in order to get what she wants.

Original title: Salome, Where She Danced (1945)

Director: Charles Lamont
Writers: Laurence Stallings, Michael J. Phillips
Stars: Yvonne De Carlo, Rod Cameron, David Bruce 
Genres: Adventure, Drama, Music, Romance, War, Western

Dubbed Italian & Spanish audio also available üëâ select your audio /subtitle languages in settings  ‚öôÔ∏è 

00:00 Full Movie 
01:56  War correspondent Jim Steed reflects on the end of the Civil War and his desire to continue reporting.
11:01  A journalist is recruited to gather information on Count von Bismarck's intentions during a delicate mission.
18:02  A story of love, war, and espionage unfolds as characters navigate the impending conflict between Prussia and Austria.
28:23  A group of performers in the American desert face challenges from bandits but manage to put on a successful show, including a captivating dance by Salome.
43:54  A Viennese dancer causes a war between Prussia and Austria.
52:55  A theater owner tries to convince a performer to leave and start a new life, but faces opposition from a colonel.
1:02:34  Dr. Ling and his colleagues plan to get rid of Major Steed, but it leads to a trap and a difficult decision for Dr. Ling.
1:12:38  A stagecoach journey becomes a nostalgic experience for the narrator, who reflects on the beauty of youth and the allure of the great outdoors.
1:22:52  A dramatic scene unfolds as Salome decides to leave and search for Cleve, but Max convinces her to stay and perform.
